main event: A group of three teenage girls reported seeing a bright white light moving slowly in the sky over Fort Carson, Colorado.
interesting points: The light was observed for about 10 seconds,The light was described as being intensely bright and white,The object appeared to move in a straight line before disappearing behind mountains,Reports from the witnesses varied in size descriptions of the object from basketball to vehicle tire,All three witnesses received a reliability estimate of good.
sighted object: a bright white light in the sky
witness description: three teenage girls from Colorado Springs, Colorado
